content: ï»¿ Zhice Yang's Homepage | æ¨æºç­ æ¨æºç­ Zhice Yang Associate Professor Room 1A-404E, SIST Building ShanghaiTech University Shanghai, China yangzhc@shanghaitech.edu.cn About me I am an associate professor in the School of Information Science and Technology at the ShanghaiTech University. I am interested in security and privacy issues in computing and network systems. I also enjoy inventing HCI systems. Publications by Topics (Full List) Trusted Sensing Visual Privacy: Bystander [CHI'25], Encrypted Tunnel [S&P'24], Physical Shield [Security'22] Biometrics: Mutability [AsiaCCS'25], Two-Factor [Security'25], Pre-Enrollment Protection [CCS'24] Wireless: Per-Antenna Obfuscation [ACSAC'24a], EMR Fingerprint [ACSAC'24b] Threat Vector: Optical Synthesis I [S&P'23] Vehicle: Machine-Friendly Marker [SenSys'25] Others Wireless Networks: EMR Backscatter [INFOCOM'25], Spectrum Scan [Code], Time Synchronization [ATC'21 Code], Display EMR [IMWUT'18], Covert Backscatter [MobiCom'17] Interaction Techniques: Magnetic Barcode [EICS'23], Tabletop Tangible [CHI'22], Web I/O [PerCom'21] Microarchitecture: Power Management [Security'21] Group Si Liao (Ph.D., 2021 - now) Fengxu Yang (Ph.D., 2022 - now) Yihong Hang (Ph.D., 2023 - now) Yuzhou Lu (Ph.D., 2025 - now) Hao Li (M.S., 2023 - now) Hanwei He (M.S., 2024 - now) Jiaqi Zhou (M.S., 2024 - now) Zaizhou Yang (M.S., 2025 - now) Tianyao Yan (M.S., 2025 - now) Alumni Yihui Yan (Ph.D., 2019 - 2025, Assistant Professor, Shanghai Maritime University) Chenfei Gao (M.S., 2022 - 2025, China Telecom) Yuelin Liu (M.S., 2021 - 2024, Ctrip) Yueli Yan (M.S., 2020 - 2023, UAES) Guanhua Zhao (M.S., 2020 - 2023, CRRC) Zhiwei Wang (M.S., 2019 - 2022, Imagination Technologies) Paizhuo Chen (M.S., 2018 - 2021, Imagination Technologies) Ningzhi Zhu (M.S., 2018 - 2021, XiaoMi) Teaching CS222 Wireless and Mobile Systems CS120 Computer Networks [Course Project] Last Update: June 2025
